challengeName: topcoder - Angular Technology and Platform field Bug Fix
detailedRequirements:
The goal of this challenge is to fix the bug in Technology and Platform field in [topcoder] site that is not showing saved values when doing advance search. 

Steps to reproduce the bug:
1. Open http://tcqa1.topcoder.com/
2. Go to Challenges > Develop
3. Click on "Advance Search" to open the form
4. Try selecting a contest type option (e.g. Bug Hunt)
5. On Technology and Platforms field, try selecting some options (e.g. .NET)
6. Click Apply button, the page should be reloaded showing the filtered results (this may vary depending on the options you selected)
7. Click on "Advance Search" to open the form again
8. Observe the Contest Type has default selected value but the Technology and Platforms field has no default value 

Please note that the datepicker is currently not working and contains some bug, you don't need to fix this issue. 

Task Overview:
Your task is to make sure that the Technology and Platforms field will have default value when a Advance Search has been made. Make sure to apply this fix to the following challenge listing pages:
- Development (Open, Past, and Upcoming Challenges)
- Data Science (Open, Past, and Upcoming Challenges) 

Resources and Guidelines:
- Latest theme and plugin available on github https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/
- Data is avaiable on https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site-data 
- Please follow the guideline in our Github repo at https://github.com/topcoderinc/tc-site/#readme 

Quick Installation guide :
1. Activate theme and plugin
2. Import provided XML file
3. Set home as front page
4. Set permalink to %post_name%
5. Please install site on local.topcoder.com (add to hosts file), so your local site can read tcsso and tcjwt cookie
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
- Any new js or css file must be included in the registry. Learn about this on script and style registry section
- Please submit updated files and .diff file only
- Once the winner is declared, create a new branch with this format <developer name>-I-117821-advance-search-technology-plaftform-filter and do Pull Request
